feedback_text: Make sure to schedule your inspection at least 2 weeks in advance - they book up fast!
Don't forget to include your vehicle VIN on the application - common rejection reason
The whole process took me 6 weeks from start to finish, not the 4-6 weeks advertised
File online - it's much faster than mail. Got approved in 3 business days!
Total cost for LLC in San Francisco was $870 ($70 state + $800 city fee)
Join a study group for the exams - passing rate is much higher with group prep
Don't underestimate the Law & Business exam - it's harder than most trade exams
